value:
$WmMPID_スミア,ch04_27_Smia_F_Normal,Face|I will... I won't... I will.$k$pOh, sorry. I was just doing a flower
fortune on whether or not I'd be
released from this contract.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face|Laevatein! New orders from Father.$k$pThe Askrans are currently on the run
in Múspell. We're to hunt them down
and eliminate them.$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face_Smile|OK. I'll help.$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Thank you, Sister.$k$p$EFace|Helbindi, you're coming, too.$k$p$WmMPID_ヘルビンディ,ch00_12_Helbindi_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Hmph. I don't think you get it...$k$p$EFace|I don't owe you a thing.$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Why...did we save him?$k$pIf he lives or if he dies...does it
matter?$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Don't speak like that, Laevatein.$k$pSure, he's a lout and as graceless as
they come...$k$p$WmMPID_ヘルビンディ,ch00_12_Helbindi_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Hey!$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face_Smile|However, this is a man who fights for
the sake of his sister. And that means
he's someone we can trust.$k$p$WmMPID_ヘルビンディ,ch00_12_Helbindi_M_Normal,Face|Dug that up, did you?$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face|You were defeated at the Fortress of
Cinders. If Father finds you, you're
dead.$k$pIf Loki finds you, it'll be even worse.
She'll threaten to tell Father, then
work you till you're dead.$k$pBut if you prove your worth in battle
here and now, you'll live. And so will
your sister.$k$p$WmMPID_ヘルビンディ,ch00_12_Helbindi_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Grr... I already know all that. No need
to spell it out.$k$p$EFace|So I'll kill them all. It's us or them.$k$p$Sbs150|
